inclusion.criterion: obese (OB) and normal weight (NW, control group) according to the International Obesity Task Force (IOTF) criteria
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: specific causes of endocrine or genetic obesity
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: previous heart, respiratory, liver and kidney diseases
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: current or past use of hormonal or interfering therapies (lipid-lowering, hypoglycemic, or antihypertensive treatments)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a family history of CAD and severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery. However, he is physically active and his fasting glucose and triglyceride levels are within normal limits.
